short_summary: Marine Construction and Mooring Buoy Services
full_summary:
=====================================

### Marine Construction and Mooring Buoy Services

#### Request for Standing Offer (RFSO)

**Reference:** WS4220123293-Doc4220415928

**Solicitation:** WS4220123293

**Tender Closing Date:** October 30, 2023, at 14:00:00

**Source of Funding:** Public Works and Government Services (PWGSC)

**Procurement Category:** Canadanegb Manufacturers List (CNST)

**Trade Agreements:** Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

**Contracting Entity:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PWGSC)
  - Location: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec K1A 0S5
  - Canada

**End-User Entity:** Department of National Defence (DND)
  - Location: 101 Colonel By Dr, Ottawa, Ontario K1A 0K2, Canada

#### Request

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PWGSC) requests Standing Offers for Marine Construction and Mooring Buoy Services. The end-user of this procurement is the Department of National Defence (DND). The procurement category is construction, specifically CNST marine construction services.

#### Required Services

* Marine construction services
* Marine buoy services
* Construction and maintenance of mooring buoys

#### Selection Criteria

* Lowest Price

#### Bidding Instructions

This is a competitive procurement. Interested parties must submit their proposals electronically to the provided contact. No paper copy submissions will be accepted.

#### Contact Information

Kate MIntzer (SPAC/PSPC)
Kate.Mintzer@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

**Url:** https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17639433?extsite=MTc2Mzk0MzNfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

#### Tender Status

This tender is now closed.
